description: Global Crude Oil Markets team member focusing on short and long-term crude oil supply/demand analysis and outlook.
Coauthor of  yearly, quarterly, and monthly reports aimed at demystify ongoing trends in the shifting world of crude oil.
Specialized in studying market trends in Mexico, Brazil and Venezuela, maintaining data and monitoring shifting political context for oil industry in these countries.
Variety and depth of research allowed me to develop critical analysis skills along with figuring out quick solutions to data problems.

Experience.company: University of Houston - Dr. Mark Smith
description: Supported the investigation of Dr. Mark Smith into cryogenic solubilities of lab-produced tholins, mimicking Titan's surface conditions.
Assisted in the design, machining, assembly, and maintenance of our ultra-high vacuum research apparatus.
Collected NMR spectra on samples and determined the concentration of specific organic chemical bonds.
Results of the investigation supported proposed NMR apparatus for future mission to Titan.
